attributes.action: Vote to say know against the Irish Sea Border, and tariffs
attributes.background:
Listen to the UK citizens of Northern Ireland,  that Northern Ireland will remain part of the United kingdom,  and that tariffs will not be added unto UK goods entering Northern Ireland.
We request that a border will not be put along the Irish sea.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. There are no proposals for Northern Ireland to leave the UK.  
	
You could start a new petition specifically calling for the UK not to agree to or impose any tariffs for goods moving between Britain and Northern Ireland, if that's what you'd like to see happen.
